text: Ramponio Verna was a comune in the Province of Como in the Lombardy region in Italy. It has two districts Ramponio and Verna. On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Lanzo d'Intelvi, Pellio Intelvi and Ramponio Verna merged to form the new municipality of Alta Valle Intelvi. Category:Former municipalities of Como
title: Ramponio Verna
